bibl.title: Letter from Thomas J. Michie to Philip Showalter Hench, March 19, 1942

div1.p: Michie thanks Hench for his note and for Kean's letter regarding R.E. Lee Michie.

div1.head: Letter from Thomas J. Michie to Philip Showalter Hench, March 19, 1942
div1.opener:
THOMAS J. MICHIE
KOPPERS BUILDING
PITTSBURGH, PA.
March 19, 1942.
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Phil:
div1.p:
Thank you very much for your note of the 10th instant
and the interesting letter from General Kean. I return it herewith
and have had copies of it made. I am sending a copy to General
Michie's daughter, Margaret Michie Wells, in New York, and also to
Atch. He will doubtless be interested as he called the matter to my
attention.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, Thomas J. Michie TJM/RG
